rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0001
rows.name:
Tell me, good sir, is this the
extent of your wares?

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0002
rows.name: Sure is. What you see is what you get.

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0003
rows.name:
Alas... It seems the treasures I seek
are nowhere to be found.

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0004
rows.name:
On another weapon shopping
spree, Rago?

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0005
rows.name: That is hardly an accurate assessment.

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0006
rows.name:
Unlike you, I am not in the habit
of purchasing every weapon that
I set eyes upon.

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0007
rows.name:
Hey, I have some standards too,
you know!

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0008
rows.name:
You are too flighty, Benkei.
At least try to give each weapon
the attention it deserves.

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0009
rows.name: Oh, shut up...

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0010
rows.name:
I'm not the one with four arms
and a weapon in each!

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0011
rows.name: Hmm.

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0012
rows.name: What should I ask Rago?

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0013
rows.name: Which weapon do you like the most?

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0014
rows.name: Don't you use any projectiles?

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0015
rows.name: What should I ask Rago?

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0016
rows.name: Which weapon's your favorite?

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0017
rows.name: Don't you use any projectiles?

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0018
rows.name: What shall I ask Rago?

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0019
rows.name: Which weapon most appeals to you?

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0020
rows.name: Do you not use any projectiles?

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0021
rows.name: What should I ask Rago?

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0022
rows.name: What weapon d'you like best?

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0023
rows.name: Don't you use any projectiles?

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0101
rows.name: My preferred weapon...?

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0102
rows.name: Hmm... I think I have none.

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0103
rows.name:
I could not call myself a warrior
if I discriminated between the
tools at my disposal.

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0104
rows.name:
The spear... The axe... The sword...
The hammer...

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0105
rows.name:
A true warrior should be able to wield
all with equal proficiency.

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0106
rows.name:
Each weapon has its strengths
and its weaknesses.

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0107
rows.name:
As a wielder of four weapons, my
greatest strength is that I can use
whichever the situation calls for.

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0108
rows.name: Mastering four different weapon styles?

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0109
rows.name:
You really are serious about the
art of battle, Rago. I don't think
many people could do that.

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0110
rows.name: Mastering four different weapons, huh?

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0111
rows.name:
Talk about the heart of a warrior.
You're something else, Rago.

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0112
rows.name:
Seeking mastery over four disparate
weapons?

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0113
rows.name:
Truly, you are a warrior to the core.
I admire your conviction, Rago.

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0114
rows.name: Mastering four different weapons, eh?

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0115
rows.name:
I guess you're not kidding about this
true warrior thing. That's no easy feat!

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0116
rows.name: It is not an easy path, for certain.

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0117
rows.name:
But I believe with enough strength
of will, nothing is impossible.

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0118
rows.name: Come, I will show you how it is done!

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0119
rows.name: Wow...

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0120
rows.name:
Well, good luck with that.
Glad I'M not this guy's Driver.

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0121
rows.name:
What do you mean by that, Benkei?
Naturally you will train with us too!

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0122
rows.name:
Whaaa?!
What have I got to do with this?!

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0123
rows.name: Enough of your whining!

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0124
rows.name:
We begin training right here, right now!
Hurry and make preparations!

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0125
rows.name:
Training isn't gonna give me four arms,
you know! I'm not doing it! No way!

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0201
rows.name:
Projectiles? They are the
domain of my Driver.

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0202
rows.name:
Uh, I don't think you're quite
getting the point.

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0203
rows.name:
You give your Driver a projectile
to use, then you don't use any
yourself? What's up with that?

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0204
rows.name:
It's your own weapon,
why don't YOU try using it?

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0206
rows.name: ...It does not suit my style.

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0207
rows.name:
As a warrior, I prefer to confront
my foes directly, man-to-man.

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0208
rows.name: Jeez, you're like a child sometimes...

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0209
rows.name: What do you even say to that?

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0210
rows.name: That's so like you, Rago.

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0211
rows.name:
I can just see you locking eyes with
the enemy in a clash of blades.

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0212
rows.name: That's just you all over, eh, Rago?

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0213
rows.name:
Locking blades with the foe, staring
'em in the eye...suits you to a tee.

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0214
rows.name: Everyone has their own style.

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0215
rows.name:
I'm sure you prefer to lock eyes with
your foe as you battle, right, Rago?

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0216
rows.name: Hey, if that's your thing, Rago!

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0217
rows.name:
I get the desire to lock blades with
a fearsome foe. Talk about intense!

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0218
rows.name:
Ah, my Driver. You understand
me so well.

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0219
rows.name: Seriously, though?

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0220
rows.name:
I mean, what kind of fair fight is it when
one guy has four arms, anyway?!

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0221
rows.name: Hmm. You may be right.

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0222
rows.name:
But such physical advantages are
not necessarily a guarantee of skill.

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0223
rows.name:
Even four arms, if used ineffectively,
can be no match for a single blade.

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0224
rows.name:
And a true master of the warrior's
arts can defeat multiple armed foes
with his bare hands alone.

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0225
rows.name:
It comes down to a question of how
far one is willing to hone oneself.

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0226
rows.name:
That is why the path of the warrior
is so difficult, yet so rewarding.

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0227
rows.name: Sounds right!

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0228
rows.name: Right on!

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0229
rows.name: I agree completely.

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0230
rows.name: True enough.

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0231
rows.name:
Oh, come on! You're just going
to go with that excuse?!

rows.label: kizunatalk054_msg0232
rows.name: This guy is SO against the rules!
